description.p: AppManager lets you install or uninstall AppImages with a familiar drag-and-drop workflow inspired by macOS. It handles desktop integration, icon extraction, executable bits, and Nautilus context menus.
Initial preview with drag-and-drop installs, dual install modes, Nautilus menus, and preferences UI.
Added optional background update checks powered by the XDG Background portal. Users grant permission on first launch, can pick an interval, and receive a notification when updates are detected.
